widgets.title: Active Surveys
widgets.count_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM surveys WHERE is_active = 1

widgets.title: Completed Surveys
widgets.count_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM survey_responses WHERE status = 'completed'

widgets.title: Pending Surveys
widgets.count_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM survey_responses WHERE status = 'pending'

widgets.title: New This Week
widgets.count_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)

widgets.title: Pending Actions
widgets.count_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'open'

widgets.title: Open Tickets
widgets.count_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'open'
